text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It's time for Tracen Academy's yearly<n>summer
camp. Symboli Rudolf stays<n>behind until the last
minute conducting<n>final checks.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Despite the time crunch, she's totally<n>unhurried,
and she makes it in perfect<n>time for the summer
camp's official<n>opening with a little help from<n>
Maruzensky.
